title: TONIGHT-->RUSTED ROOT! Rusted Root has sold more than 3 million albums worldwide. The band's worldly...

attachments.displayName: TONIGHT-->RUSTED ROOT! Rusted Root has sold more than 3 million albums worldwide. The band's worldly style has charmed fans of roots music and world rock since the early 90's. Hits include "Send Me On My Way," "Ecstasy" and "Martyr". Rusted Root has toured with Toad the Wet Sprocket, Santana, The Grateful Dead, Dave Matthews Band, The Allman Brothers Band, HORDE Festival and, perhaps most notably, won the highly coveted support slot on the landmark Jimmy Page/Robert Palmer reunion tour. Crowfield will play an opening set.

object.content: TONIGHT-->RUSTED ROOT! Rusted Root has sold more than 3 million albums worldwide. The band's worldly style has charmed fans of roots music and world rock since the early 90's. Hits include "Send Me On My Way," "Ecstasy" and "Martyr". Rusted Root has toured with Toad the Wet Sprocket, Santana, The Grateful Dead, Dave Matthews Band, The Allman Brothers Band, HORDE Festival and, perhaps most notably, won the highly coveted support slot on the landmark Jimmy Page/Robert Palmer reunion tour. Crowfield will play an opening set.
